name: HACKED (itch) (JwgK)
description:
Hack into Evl's mainframe by connecting all the nodes! But be quick, before your caught by The Evl IDS.

Controls

Mouse 1 - Rotate Tile Anticlockwise
Mouse 2 - Rotate Tile Clockwise

Created for the AGBIC 2019 Game Jam.
Inspired by http://famicase.com/19/softs/028.html & Warframe

Music By: https://opengameart.org/content/red-doors-v20
